column4: How do I make rsync create the directory structure when rsyncing i.e. /folder/subfolder/file to / and wanted result is rsync creating /folder/subfolder at dest ?
How do I make rsync create the directory structure when rsyncing i.e. /folder/subfolder/file to / and wanted result is rsync creating /folder/subfolder at dest ?
foo and foo/   are both directories for rsync, but the handling is different...read the manual and take care about the trailing slash
